page.title: 16Our Survey of Tean
page.content: In our questioning of 200 people we found that most people in Tean now live in the new housing estates which have been built around the village in the last 20 years. Most people like the area for its friendliness, fresh air and country views.Some concern was expressed about untidiness and traffic noise,but without exception the biggest recent improvement is the by-passing of the village(Feb.1985).The greatest complaints were about the lack of facilities for youngsters both socially and economically.There was concern about the limited shopping in the area, most people going elsewhere to shop. Opinion was divided about public transport,some thought it adequate but others did not,although the majority of people travelled by car.
